text: <https://github.com/JuliaLang/Pkg.jl/issues/2323|https://github.com/JuliaLang/Pkg.jl/issues/2323>
Seems like windows sometimes might not like it when we use more tasks than `number of physical cores + 1`

elements.text: Seems like windows sometimes might not like it when we use more tasks than

text: Try setting `ENV["JULIA_NUM_PRECOMPILE_TASKS"]` to that number or less
We currently use `Sys.CPU_THREADS + 1`
Seems like this is an internal  bug with threading in Julia on Windows
